name: Phantasmal Martyrs
effectText: While you have at least 2 other cards in your hand, and control "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" or "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder": Send your entire hand to the GY; Special Summon 3 "Phantasmal Martyr Tokens" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Attack Position.
